description: A school deputy head has been killed and children hurt in the attack in the northern town of Vrutky.
title: Slovakia: Deadly knife attack at primary school in Vrutky
title_page: Slovakia: Deadly knife attack at primary school in Vrutky - BBC News
maintext: A police patrol soon reached the scene and tried to arrest him. When he confronted them with a knife, they shot him, the police chief said. Two officers were wounded by gunfire.
